name: MONO NO AWARE 050📀💿📀 (Frequency Ghost)
description:
5th Piece Of The Limbo 辺獄 Hengoku Series. After The Hengoku Bug reached its peak, many people reacted to it by detaching from reality even more than before. Mono No Aware is a feeling of profound nostalgia related to the beauty of life itself and its constant mutations. Hina Watanabe has developed uncontrollable perceptive powers after the spreading of the 辺獄 radiations and a feeling of boundless, ecstatic melancholia that lets her feel what the whole the universe is feeling at a specific time. She has become a frequency ghost, tuning to the sound of unperceivable feelings.Traits: Synthwave listener/ Gun Shooter / Playstation Player
Animation and original score by Limbo.
